scripts.restore-global: npm install -g typescript tslint typings nodemon
scripts.restore-all: npm run restore-global && npm run restore-local
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && echo Build finished!
scripts.start: npm run build && API_PORT=5000 nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.docker-run: npm run build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml up -d --remove-orphans --build --force-recreate
scripts.docker-watch: npm run docker-run && npm run build-watch
scripts.docker-stop: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml down && echo Docker Compose Down finished!
scripts.docker-cleanup: npm run docker-stop-cleanup && docker rmi eimy_fbg_be-api eimy_fbg_be-api-livedebug eimy_fbg_be-api-base || echo Cleanup finished!
